8e5276d46c8d11e2a2aa782bcb0741355e845d0213b14562b425dfa95218eb7b;2018-11-15T16:40:11Z;toolService;toolService:service;U-Compare Segmentation Service ;Web service created by exporting UIMA-based workflow from the U-Compare text mining system.
Functionality: Identifies clauses/segments in plain text. Also identifies sentences, tokens, POS tags and lemmas. 
Tools in workflow: Cafetiere Sentence Splitter (University of Manchester), TTL Tokenizer (RACAI, Romania), UAIC-Â­POSTagger (UAIC, Romania) , UAIC-ClauseSplitter (UAIC, Romania)
NOTE: The licence provided covers the web service only. Tools used to create the workflow may have their own licences

notes:
Web service created by exporting UIMA-based workflow from the U-Compare text mining system.
Functionality: Identifies clauses/segments in plain text. Also identifies sentences, tokens, POS tags and lemmas. 
Tools in workflow: Cafetiere Sentence Splitter (University of Manchester), TTL Tokenizer (RACAI, Romania), UAIC-Â­POSTagger (UAIC, Romania) , UAIC-ClauseSplitter (UAIC, Romania)
NOTE: The licence provided covers the web service only. Tools used to create the workflow may have their own licences
title: U-Compare Segmentation Service
